name: SCOTDOC1.WAD
description: This is my first real pwad, however I have practiced. This wad makes you think, at the same time requires skill at the trigger. A perfect combination. There are a few techniques which I have yet to see in other wads, including a unique ending. Please, email any comments or suggestions to me. In order to complete this level on ultra-violence on your FIRST try with no cheats you must be an extremely experienced player with a lot of luck. Good Luck.
